snippet: Public remarks by Fed officials suggest a decision on whether to continue efforts to stoke the economy will not come before the policy committee’s next meeting in April.
abstract: Scheduled meeting of the Federal Reserve's policy-making committee is unlikely to address what comes next for the central bank; Fed plans to complete by June its current efforts to suppress long-term interest rates, but new measures, if they are even necessary, are unclear, as the economy appears to be gaining strength.
lead_paragraph: Public remarks by Fed officials suggest a decision on whether to continue efforts to stoke the economy will not come before the policy committee’s next meeting in April.

headline.seo: As Fed Meeting Nears, It Awaits Clearer Economic Signals
headline.main: As Fed Officials Prepare to Meet, They Await Clearer Economic Signals
headline.print_headline: As Fed Officials Prepare to Meet, They Await Clearer Economic Signals
